coursesData.title: Curso em Vídeo - Python
coursesData.about: Python course divided into 3 modules: Introduction to the Python language, Repetition structures and data structures, tuples, lists, dictionaries, as well as teaching functions, modules, packages, and error handling.

coursesData.title: Curso de JavaScript e TypeScript do básico ao avançado
coursesData.about: Modern JavaScript (ES6+) for front-end (with Webpack, Babel, React, React Hooks, Redux, HTML5, CSS3 and more) and back-end (with Node, Express, MySQL/MariaDB, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Next.Js, Strapi and more).

coursesData.title: NLW 6 - Trilha NodeJs
coursesData.about: Bootcamp on backend development, where an application with scalable and simple architecture for the web using a flexible and popular language was developed.

coursesData.title: NLW 6 - Trilha ReacJs
coursesData.about: Bootcamp on front-end development, where an application with modern and reactive interfaces on the web using a modular and scalable library was developed.

coursesData.title: Ignite - ReactJS
coursesData.about: Acceleration program focused on specialization, for those who already master programming, this track shows how to build modern and reactive interfaces on the web using a modular and scalable library.

coursesData.title: Ignite - NodeJS
coursesData.about: Acceleration program focused on specialization, for those who already master programming, this track shows how to build scalable and simple architectures for the web using a flexible and popular language.

coursesData.title: Formação Nest.js
coursesData.about: NestJS is a framework for building efficient, reliable, and scalable server-side applications in Node.js. It uses modern JavaScript, but it's written with TypeScript, offering the best of both worlds: flexibility and strong typing.

coursesData.title: Formação Java e Spring Boot
coursesData.about: Java Spring Boot (Spring Boot) is a tool that makes it faster and easier to develop web applications and microservices with Spring Framework.

coursesData.title: Android com Kotlin: criando um app
coursesData.about: Kotlin is a cross-platform, object-oriented, functional, concise, and statically typed programming language developed by JetBrains in 2011.
skills: Creation and implementation of layouts with Constraint Layout
What are Activities and how to create them
